textBox.richText: I have put together a page for Links Regarding the Genocide in East Timor. There isn’t much, but it should help anyone interested get started in finding resources for their research. I have also previously put up a page for a Bibliography of the Genocide in East Timor - again, not much, but a start. If you have any resources that aren’t listed here, I’d be glad to hear about them, so please email me! This also means that the main topic page for Genocide in East Timor should be finished sometime this week. I hope to get more done than just that, but it is looking like a very busy time.
